attributes.additional_details: Put a safe pedestrian crossing on Manor Way between St.Cuthberts Church Vicarage and the Doctors Surgery (William Brown Centre) and move the public footpath closer to the William Brown centre to make the crossing far enough up the road to give vehicle drivers the distance to stop safely so crossing is possible. People pushing pushchairs/wheelchairs and the elderly, have the right to cross safely without having to panic that a vehicle will make contact with them if they do not dash across
